modules.name: autorun
modules.script:
self.app_url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreiPuchko/q2market/main/q2faktura"
self.app_title = "q2faktura"
self.app_description = "Rechnungen und mehr"

const.check("firma_logo", "Logo picture", "")
const.check("faktura_header_image", "Header image", "")

import pdfplumber
run_module("ref_ini")

modules.name: w4
modules.script:
cu = q2cursor("""select distinct product  as name
                ,unit
                , price
                from invoice_lines 
                """).browse()
                
for x in cu.records():
    insert("ref_wrk", x)
